pullrequest.title: Fix use_parent_model_frame for joint axis with DART

content.raw:
I made a few changes in 1c2774ee8789ffff and 190d3d4e4137891c00725 (branch gazebo_4_issue_1143_scpeters):

* 1c2774ee8789ffff: restore some `{}`'s to simplify diff in test (see [comparison with gazebo_4.0](#!/osrf/gazebo/compare/gazebo_4_issue_1143_scpeters..gazebo_4.0#chg-test/regression/494_joint_axis_frame.cc))
* 190d3d4e413789: remove some old comments and simplify one piece of duplicated code
content.html:
I made a few changes in 1c2774ee8789ffff and 190d3d4e4137891c00725 (branch gazebo_4_issue_1143_scpeters):

  • 1c2774ee8789ffff: restore some {}'s to simplify diff in test (see comparison with gazebo_4.0)
  • 190d3d4e413789: remove some old comments and simplify one piece of duplicated code
